title: GET_ENTITY_INDEX_FROM_MAPDATA
content:
0xEE43540D// GetEntityIndexFromMapdata
int GET_ENTITY_INDEX_FROM_MAPDATA(int mapdata, int entity);Parameters:mapdata: The input map data index from GET_MAPDATA_FROM_HASH_KEY.entity: The input entity handle from GET_ENTITY_MAPDATA_OWNER.Returns: A transient (non-persistable) index to the requested entity, or -1.Returns the transient entity index for a specified mapdata/entity pair.
This function supports SDK infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
codeBlocks:
